pageContext.claim: “African Americans are very angry at the double standard on full display in Virginia!”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear which of the controversies engulfing Virginia politics Trump is referring to, but a recent Post poll found that African Americans were largely on the fence. Lt. Gov. Justin Fairfax, who is black, continued to enjoy wide support among African Americans after he was accused of sexual assault. Gov. Ralph Northam, who is white, had less support among blacks after a photo of his medical school yearbook surfaced with a picture of a man in blackface and a man in KKK robes. Trump has been accused of sexual harassment and of being racist.
